title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 4 - Appointment And Promotion
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 4 - Appointment And Promotion

State Regulations
§ 4.1 - Certification of open competitive and promotion eligible lists
§ 4.2 - Appointment and promotion
§ 4.3 - Trainee appointments and promotions
§ 4.4 - Appointment to seasonal positions
§ 4.5 - Probation
§ 4.6 to 4.7 - Repealed
§ 4.8 - Emergency appointments
§ 4.9 - Effect of temporary appointment on eligibility for permanent appointment
§ 4.10 - Temporary, provisional or trainee appointment or promotion of permanent employee
§ 4.11 - Contingent permanent appointments to encumbered positions
§ 4.12 - Repealed

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 4, ch. I, pt. 4

Statutory authority: Civil Service Law, §§6, 63

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
